title: Visual Aesthetic Design Strategies in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended course efficiently delivering graduate-level mathematical concepts using visual elements. Includes activities for creating and analyzing visual learning materials using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra, Desmos) that visualize mathematical concepts.
Learners can analyze the impact of visual elements on cognitive load and learning immersion in online learning environments.
Learners can create instructional materials explaining mathematical concepts with aesthetic elements (color schemes, layouts, animations).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
